How a mendicant who lives with a residen: When a mendicant sees a sight with the eye, bad, unskillful phenomena arise
Since they have bad unskillful qualities residing within, they’re said to have a resident student
Since they’re mastered by bad unskillful qualities, they’re said to have a teaching master
How a mendicant who lives without a resi: When a mendicant sees a sight with the eye, bad, unskillful phenomena don’t arise
Since they don’t have bad unskillful qualities residing within, they’re said to not have a resident student
Since they’re not mastered by bad unskillful qualities, they’re said to not have a teaching master
